mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, John Augustine Washington III to Jane C. Washington, 1846 January 27
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Washington, John Augustine, III, 1821-1861
mdRecord.dcterms:description: John Augustine Washington writes to his mother in Blakeley regarding travels home partially by horse and sleigh through the Piedmont; landscape descriptions; business; family greetings. Autograph letter signed, 4 pages, integral address panel, partial wax seal, red wax.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Elswyth Thane Beebe Collection of Washington Family Papers
